page.title: 18A Day In The Life Of My Dad
page.content:
A Day In The Life Of My Dad
Being an ambulance driver I don't stick to a daily routine because I work shifts.My job is very interesting. In my spare time I like fishing and gardening,we have a large garden.I have a 400 CC motorbike and I belong to a local motorbike club.As a family we enjoy caravan touring and bike rides in the country.
A Day in the Life of My Mum At seven o'clock I get up and make breakfast. I do the school lunches then I feed and bath the baby and put her in the garden. I hoover the house, go shopping, then do lunch and feed the baby. I do the washing and ironing in the afternoon then prepare the dinner.In the evening I watch T.V.
